items.title: Nvidia’s strong forecast calms AI bubble jitters, for now
items.creator: Reuters

items.translated_title: Nvidia’s strong forecast calms AI bubble jitters, for now
items.content:
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on Wednesday shrugged off concerns about an artificial intelligence bubble as the company surprised Wall Street with accelerating growth after several quarters of slowing sales.
The chipmaker’s stellar third-quarter earnings and fourth-quarter forecast calmed, at least temporarily, investor nerves over concerns an AI boom has outrun fundamentals.
Global markets have looked to the chip designer to determine whether investing billions of dollars in AI infrastructure...

items.title: AI pioneer Yann LeCun leaving Meta to launch start-up
items.creator: Reuters
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: AI pioneer Yann LeCun leaving Meta to launch start-up
items.content:
Yann LeCun, one of the founding figures of modern artificial intelligence and a pivotal force at Meta Platforms, said on Wednesday he plans to leave the company at the end of the year to launch a new AI start-up.
LeCun has been a key part of Meta’s AI ambitions for more than a decade. He joined the company in 2013 to create Facebook AI Research (FAIR), the in-house lab that helped transform Meta into one of the AI leaders.
Over 12 years, he served five as FAIR’s founding director and seven as...

items.title: Will AI kill the middle class?
items.creator: Brian P. Klein
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Will AI kill the middle class?
items.content: Warning signs are flashing from experts, entrepreneurs and workers concerned that automation is coming for a wide range of information-oriented jobs. What ordinarily would be just another boom-bust cycle fuelled by computer-generated efficiency, a typewriter to keyboard type of evolution, is this time threatening to overturn the basic social contract between employers and employees. Unless and until this is taken seriously by policymakers, the modern middle class risks becoming a relic of...

items.translated_title: Google’s new Gemini model puts China’s AI start-ups on the defensive
items.content:
The release of Google DeepMind’s latest artificial intelligence model has sparked debate about the future of US-China competition in AI and the ability of Chinese developers to keep up.
Gemini 3 Pro, released on Tuesday, overtook OpenAI’s GPT-5.1 to give Google the top spot on leading AI benchmarking firm Artificial Analysis’ Intelligence Index for the first time.
The model was roundly praised by fellow industry competitors, including OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Lin Junyang, the technical lead of...

China’s growing pipeline of novel drug candidates is expected to draw increased attention from global pharmaceutical companies and investors scouting for licensing opportunities, as the country’s clinical trial capacity has expanded to match those in the US.
That assessment was made by Shanghai-based Helen Chen, Greater China managing partner at L.E.K. Consulting, one of the most respected analysts in the mainland’s life sciences industry.

items.content:
UBTech Robotics says it plans to expand its assembly of humanoid robots 10-fold next year to as many as 5,000 units and double that to 10,000 in 2027, as the scale economics of China’s advanced manufacturing prowess shaves a fifth off production costs every year.
The Shenzhen-based company was on track to deliver 500 humanoid robots for industrial use by the end of this year, scaling up since delivering the first 10 droids last year, UBTech’s chief branding officer Michael Tam said during an...

The project was initiated earlier this year by Huobi founder Leon Li Lin, HashKey Group chairman and CEO Xiao Feng, Meitu co-founder Mike Cai Wensheng and Fenbushi Capital founder Bo Shen, who aimed to raise US$500 million to launch a DAT firm that would invest in the world’s...

items.content:

items.translated_title: Nvidia’s latest earnings run into a market suddenly afraid of AI spending
items.content:
Wall Street will get a sense of where the billions of dollars being spent on artificial intelligence are going when Nvidia Corp reports its earnings after the bell on Wednesday. How the sinking stock market will react is another question.
“This is a ‘so goes Nvidia, so goes the market’ kind of report,” said Scott Martin, chief investment officer at Kingsview Wealth Management, which owns shares of Nvidia and several of its Big Tech peers.
Analysts expect the Nasdaq-listed semiconductor behemoth...

items.translated_title: Google launches Gemini 3, its ‘most intelligent’ AI model yet
items.content:
Alphabet’s Google debuted an updated version of its artificial intelligence model, Gemini, that executives said represented a “massive jump” in reasoning and coding ability.
The new model, Gemini 3, will be available immediately across all of Google’s major products, including search, and can answer questions with interactive graphics.
Gemini 3, like its predecessor, could process text, images and other media as well as solve complex science and maths problems, the company said. It had...

items.translated_title: Meta defeats US antitrust case over Instagram and WhatsApp acquisitions
items.content:
Facebook parent company Meta Platforms defeated a US attempt to unwind its acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp on Tuesday when a federal judge ruled the company did not hold a social media monopoly.
The ruling gives Big Tech its first decisive win against the antitrust crackdown started in US President Donald Trump’s first term, and is a major setback for the Federal Trade Commission, which is pursuing a separate antitrust case against Amazon.com.
The agency sought to force Meta to...

items.title: 百度第三季度财报：AI收入增长50%，但整体业绩下滑 (原标题: China’s Baidu posts 50% rise in AI revenue despite third-quarter slump)
items.creator: Ben Jiang
items.summary:
# 百度第三季度财报：AI业务强劲增长，整体业绩下滑

中国互联网搜索巨头百度公布了截至9月的第三季度财报，其中人工智能（AI）相关业务表现突出，成为该季度的一大亮点。

## AI业务表现亮眼
*   **收入增长显著**：百度AI相关业务收入同比增长50%。
*   **具体金额**：AI相关云基础设施、应用和营销服务销售额达到100亿元人民币（约合14亿美元）。
*   **战略意义**：百度首席财务官何海健表示，AI业务的增长为公司“可持续的长期增长奠定了坚实基础”。
*   **信息透明度提升**：这是百度首次详细披露其AI业务的收入增长情况，旨在帮助投资者更好地了解其AI运营规模以及技术投资如何驱动增长。

## 整体财务表现不佳
*   **总收入下滑**：公司第三季度总收入同比下降7%，至312亿元人民币（约合44亿美元）。
*   **主要原因**：收入下滑主要归因于其核心广告业务需求疲软。
*   **净亏损**：由于资产减记，百度本季度净亏损达到112亿元人民币。

## 高管评论
百度联合创始人、董事长兼首席执行官李彦宏在一份声明中表示，公司已在其业务组合中“展示了AI的变革价值”。

## 图片
![百度联合创始人、董事长兼首席执行官李彦宏在北京的一次公司活动上发表讲话。图片来源：美联社](https://img.i-scmp.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=contain,width=1024,format=auto/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2025/11/18/8d093316-59ba-433c-9eaa-4a274b97af78_1126e908.jpg)
*百度联合创始人、董事长兼首席执行官李彦宏在北京的一次公司活动上发表讲话。图片来源：美联社*
items.shortSummary: 百度第三季度财报显示，尽管整体收入同比下降7%至312亿元人民币，并因广告业务疲软和资产减记导致净亏损112亿元，但其AI相关业务表现亮眼。AI收入同比增长50%，达到100亿元人民币，成为该季度的一大亮点，为公司长期增长奠定基础。这是百度首次详细披露AI业务收入增长，首席执行官李彦宏强调了AI的变革价值。
items.translated_title: 百度第三季度财报：AI收入增长50%，但整体业绩下滑

images.alt: Baidu co-founder, chairman and CEO Robin Li Yanhong speaks at a company event in Beijing. Photo: AP
images.title: Baidu co-founder, chairman and CEO Robin Li Yanhong speaks at a company event in Beijing. Photo: AP

items.content:
Chinese internet search giant Baidu on Tuesday reported a 50 per cent increase in artificial intelligence-related revenue in the three months ended September from a year ago, which was the bright spot to an otherwise lacklustre financial quarter.
The Beijing-based company’s third-quarter revenue declined 7 per cent year on year to 31.2 billion yuan (US$4.4 billion), owing to sluggish demand in its advertising business, while its net loss hit 11.2 billion yuan on asset writedowns.
While its core...

items.title: Cloudflare中断导致全球ChatGPT和X访问受阻 (原标题: Cloudflare outage disrupts access to ChatGPT and X worldwide)
items.creator: Bloomberg
items.summary:
# Cloudflare全球中断影响ChatGPT和X

周二，网络安全公司Cloudflare发生了一次全球性的网络中断，导致包括人工智能平台ChatGPT和社交媒体平台X在内的多个网站的部分用户无法正常访问。

## 事件详情与Cloudflare的回应

*   **中断范围**：此次中断是全球性的，影响了Cloudflare的众多客户。
*   **受影响服务**：ChatGPT和X是受影响的知名平台，用户被拒绝访问。
*   **Cloudflare的调查**：这家总部位于旧金山的公司在其网站上表示，正在调查一个“可能影响多个客户”的问题。
*   **内部问题**：在中断期间，Cloudflare自己的中断状态网站一度无法加载。此外，该公司此前在客户支持门户方面也遇到过问题，并且当天早些时候计划在某些区域进行定期维护。

## Cloudflare的角色与历史

*   **核心功能**：Cloudflare的软件被全球数十万家公司广泛使用。它在网站和最终用户之间充当一个“缓冲”层，主要作用是保护网站免受可能因流量过载而导致的攻击。
*   **过往记录**：文章指出，Cloudflare的系统此前曾多次发生故障。

![ChatGPT用户周二因全球网络中断而无法访问该平台。图片来源：路透社](https://img.i-scmp.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=contain,width=1024,format=auto/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2025/11/18/f264ec30-5102-49f7-815f-e2e4de7fccd9_6deaac00.jpg)
*ChatGPT用户周二因全球网络中断而无法访问该平台。图片来源：路透社*
items.shortSummary: 周二，网络安全公司Cloudflare发生全球性网络中断，导致ChatGPT和社交媒体平台X等网站的用户访问受阻。Cloudflare正在调查此次影响多个客户的问题，其系统在全球范围内被广泛使用，充当网站与用户之间的缓冲。Cloudflare此前也曾发生过类似故障。
items.translated_title: Cloudflare中断导致全球ChatGPT和X访问受阻

images.alt: ChatGPT users were denied access to the platform on Tuesday because of a global networking outage. Photo: Reuters
images.title: ChatGPT users were denied access to the platform on Tuesday because of a global networking outage. Photo: Reuters

items.content:
Cloudflare has fully restored its services after an outage on Tuesday at the web-infrastructure company prevented thousands from accessing major internet platforms, including X and ChatGPT.
The company said the outage that began around 6.30am was caused by an automatically generated configuration file, designed to manage potential security threats.
The file grew too large and crashed the software system handling traffic for several Cloudflare services, the company, whose network handles around a...
